content:
TruWest Credit Union is a not-for-profit financial cooperative that was established in 1952 to serve the employees of Motorola in Phoenix, Arizona. Today, TruWest Credit Union is based in Tempe, Arizona, and serves members across the United States.

TruWest Credit Union offers a range of financial products and services, including checking and savings accounts, loans, credit cards, and investment services. Members can also take advantage of online banking and mobile banking services to manage their accounts.

One of the distinguishing features of TruWest Credit Union is its commitment to providing personalized service to its members. Members have access to dedicated account managers who can help them with their financial needs and offer financial advice.

TruWest Credit Union is also committed to giving back to the community. The credit union supports local charities and organizations through its Community Connection program and offers financial education programs to help members improve their financial literacy.

Overall, TruWest Credit Union is a member-owned financial cooperative that aims to provide personalized service and support to its members while giving back to the community.
